item.title: It's Comical
item.description: Yesterday I split my guts laughing Comic named Sebastian has me cracking straight infatuation and satisfaction The topic was real as they come: who are you but not some politicians sold bought and paid for son I liked that To think we wage wars on the youth there and here at the same time is timeless and a forgotten art maybe though it weighs a ton Its all about “Who won?
